about_the_game:
Make your way through a solar system on the brink of disaster and drive out the invading forces of the Remnants in this intense action-packed space combat roguelike!

The Remnants launched a full-scale invasion on Union territory and have taken over the Solar Transportation Network. But without knowledge of the complex technology, a devastating calamity looms, and the access points to the network threaten to rip everything apart in a disastrous singularity.

You are the pilot of a spaceship with groundbreaking propulsion technology, now spearheading the counter-strike against Remnant forces across various planet hubs. You are joined by your onboard companion, Merlin, who automatically supports you with various active and passive skills throughout your encounters. Now it's up to you to secure the transportation network. Drive out the Remnants and ensure RETRIBUTION!

▶ Intense 3D Space Combat

Experience thrilling dogfights and strategic battles against massive warships. Destroy shield generators, engines, and turrets to turn the tide in your favor.

▶ Roguelike

Engage in procedurally generated missions that last 5–7 minutes, offering high replayability with each run.

▶ Onboard companion

Your ship’s AI, Merlin, automatically supports you in combat, executing abilities and assisting in strategic maneuvers. Upgrade Merlin’s skills to create powerful synergies.

▶ Customizable Builds

Earn rewards to upgrade weapons, ship modules, and AI abilities. Experiment with specialized skills like friend-or-foe disruption or improved dash abilities.

▶ High-stakes battles

Engage in battles in hubs like Mars or Jupiter to prevent the catastrophic collapse of the Solar Transportation Network.

▶ Permadeath pressure

Repair and upgrade your ship between missions to survive. One mistake could spell the end.
